reviews.title: Worked as advertised
reviews.comment: App worked flawlessly on GS3 ATT variant. Helpful in getting free WiFi in Madrid while on our vacation.
reviews.author: Luan Hong

reviews.title: Worse than WORTHLESS
reviews.comment: Never able to make a network connection in San Francisco California USA. When connecting to WiFi network causes my Samsung Galaxy S3 to shutdown and restart even though the wifi network appears to be strongest -- after three months of hoping this free service would work I am giving up **total failure**

reviews.title: Very slow
reviews.comment: The app takes a long time to open, plus showing a useless splash screen.

reviews.title: App is useless
reviews.comment: I decided to test this app in town at the weekend. I get a HTTP 500 error code but the exception on the server was not even handled gracefully with a user friendly exception but actually showing the server exception on screen! This is hugely embarassing.  If dublin city council rolled out this over a few weeks ago, did they spend more time and money on the mosaics rather than testing this poor quality app!?  POOR, POOR, POOR.
reviews.author: shane lee
